title.en: The Excellent Benefits of the Praise

text.en: Oṃ. Homage to the noble lady Tārā!
text.en-trans: om jetsünma pakma drolma la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to Tārā, swift and valiant,
text.en-trans: chaktsal taré nyurma pamo

text.en: Homage to Tuttārā, who banishes fear,
text.en-trans: tuttara yi jikpa selma

text.en: Homage to Turā, who fulfils every need,
text.en-trans: turé dön kün jinpé drolma

text.en: Withsvāhāwe offer you honor and praise!1
text.en-trans: sa hé yigé khyö la dü do

text.en: Homage to Tārā, swift and valiant,
text.en-trans: chaktsal drolma nyurma pamo

text.en: Whose glance flashes like flares of lightning;
text.en-trans: chen ni kechik lok dang dra ma

text.en: Born on the heart of a blossoming lotus
text.en-trans: jikten sum gön chukyé zhal gyi

text.en: That rose from the tears of the Triple World’s Lord. (1)
text.en-trans: gesar jewa lé ni jung ma

text.en: Homage to the one whose countenance is
text.en-trans: chaktsal tönké dawa küntu

text.en: A hundred full moons gathered in autumn,
text.en-trans: gangwa gya ni tsekpé zhal ma

text.en: Smiling and glowing with brilliant radiance,
text.en-trans: karma tongtrak tsokpa nam kyi

text.en: Like a thousand stars clustered, ablaze. (2)
text.en-trans: rabtu chewé ö rab bar ma

text.en: Homage, golden lady, whose lotus-hand
text.en-trans: chaktsal ser ngo chu né kyé kyi

text.en: Is graced with a blue water-born flower.
text.en-trans: pemé chak ni nampar gyen ma

text.en: You embody generosity, diligence, endurance,
text.en-trans: jinpa tsöndrü katub zhiwa

text.en: Serenity, patience and meditation. (3)
text.en-trans: zöpa samten chöyul nyi ma

text.en: Homage to the one whose victories are endless,
text.en-trans: chaktsal dezhin shekpé tsuktor

text.en: Jewel on the great Tathāgata’s crown.
text.en-trans: tayé nampar gyalwa chö ma

text.en: You are well served by the heirs of the Victors,
text.en-trans: malü parol chinpa tobpé

text.en: Those who’ve accomplished all the perfections. (4)
text.en-trans: gyalwé sé kyi shintu ten ma

text.en: Homage to the one who, withtuttāraandhūṃ,
text.en-trans: chaktsal tuttara hung yigé

text.en: Fills desire realms unto the ends of space.
text.en-trans: dö dang chok dang namkha gang ma

text.en: You trample underfoot the seven worlds,
text.en-trans: jikten dünpo zhab kyi nen té

text.en: And have the strength to summon all. (5)
text.en-trans: lüpa mepar gukpar nü ma

text.en: Homage to the one, praised by Indra,
text.en-trans: chaktsal gyajin melha tsangpa

text.en: Agni, Brahmā, Maruts,2and Śiva.
text.en-trans: lunglha natsok wangchuk chö ma

text.en: All the hosts of bhūtas, vetālas,
text.en-trans: jungpo rolang driza nam dang

text.en: Gandharvas and yakṣas pay tribute to you. (6)
text.en-trans: nöjin tsok kyi dün né tö ma

text.en: Homage to the one who, withtraṭandphaṭ,
text.en-trans: chaktsal tré cheja dang pé kyi

text.en: Crushes the enemies’yantras3to dust.
text.en-trans: parol trulkhor rabtu jom ma

text.en: With right leg bent in and left leg extended,
text.en-trans: yé kum yön kyang zhab kyi nen té

text.en: Shining you tread amidst a turbulent blaze. (7)
text.en-trans: mebar trukpa shintu bar ma

text.en: Homage to Ture, the fearsome lady,
text.en-trans: chaktsal turé jikpa chenpö

text.en: Destroyer of the most powerful demons.
text.en-trans: dü kyi pawo nampar jom ma

text.en: With a lotus-face and a deep-furrowed brow,
text.en-trans: chukyé zhal ni tronyer den dzé

text.en: You are the slayer of each and every foe. (8)
text.en-trans: drawo tamché malü sö ma

text.en: Homage to the one whose fingers grace
text.en-trans: chaktsal könchok sum tsön chakgyé

text.en: Her heart and display the Three Jewelsmudrā.
text.en-trans: sormö tukkar nampar gyen ma

text.en: You’re graced by wheels adorning every direction,
text.en-trans: malü chok kyi khorlö gyenpé

text.en: With dazzling radiance that overwhelms all.4(9)
text.en-trans: rang gi ö kyi tsok nam truk ma

text.en: Homage to the one, supremely joyous,
text.en-trans: chaktsal rabtu gawa jipé

text.en: Whose splendorous crown spreads garlands of light.
text.en-trans: ugyen ö kyi trengwa pelma

text.en: Smiling and laughing, withtuttāre
text.en-trans: zhepa rab zhé tuttara yi

text.en: You bring demons and worlds under control. (10)
text.en-trans: dü dang jikten wang du dzé ma

text.en: Homage to the one who can summon
text.en-trans: chaktsal sa zhi kyongwé tsok nam

text.en: The hosts of earthly guardians.
text.en-trans: tamché gukpar nüpa nyi ma

text.en: Your frown it quivers, and the syllablehūṃ
text.en-trans: tronyer yowé yigé hung gi

text.en: Delivers us all from every misfortune. (11)
text.en-trans: pongpa tamché nampar drolma

text.en: Homage to the one, so brightly adorned,
text.en-trans: chaktsal dawé dumbü ugyen

text.en: Who has a sliver of moon for a crown,5
text.en-trans: gyenpa tamché shintu bar ma

text.en: Your locks are graced by Amitābha,
text.en-trans: ralpé trö na öpakmé lé

text.en: Whose gleaming rays stream forever forth. (12)
text.en-trans: takpar shintu ö rab dzé ma

text.en: Homage to the one in a blazing halo
text.en-trans: chaktsal kalpa tamé mé tar

text.en: Of flames, all-consuming, apocalyptic—
text.en-trans: barwé trengwé ü na né ma

text.en: Your right leg stretched out and left leg bent inward,
text.en-trans: yé kyang yön kum künné kor gé

text.en: The whirl of enemies blissfully crushing. (13)
text.en-trans: dra yi pung ni nampar jom ma

text.en: Homage to the one who strikes the ground
text.en-trans: chaktsal sa zhi ngö la chak gi

text.en: With her palms and stamps her feet—
text.en-trans: til gyi nün ching zhab kyi dung ma

text.en: Your brow deeply furrowed, withhūṃyou smash
text.en-trans: tronyer chen dzé yigé hung gi

text.en: The seven netherworlds to nothing but dust. (14)
text.en-trans: rimpa dünpo nam ni gem ma

text.en: Homage to the one, blissful, gracious and tranquil,
text.en-trans: chaktsal dé ma gé ma zhi ma

text.en: Whose domain is the peace of nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: nya ngen dé zhi chöyul nyi ma

text.en: Withoṃandsvāhāin perfect union,
text.en-trans: soha om dang yangdak denpé

text.en: You destroy every terrible evil. (15)
text.en-trans: dikpa chenpo jompa nyi ma

text.en: Homage to the one, immersed in rapture,
text.en-trans: chaktsal künné kor rabga bé

text.en: Who shatters the bodies of all foes.
text.en-trans: dra yi lü ni rabtu gem ma

text.en: You manifest from the wisdom-syllablehūṃ,6
text.en-trans: yigé chupé ngak ni köpé

text.en: And display each of your mantra’s ten syllables. (16)
text.en-trans: rigpa hung lé drölma nyi ma

text.en: Homage to Ture, her feet stomping boldly,
text.en-trans: chaktsal turé zhab ni dabpé

text.en: Formed from the seed of the syllablehūṃ.
text.en-trans: hung gi nampé sabön nyi ma

text.en: The mountains of Meru, Mandara and Vindhya,
text.en-trans: rirab mendara dang bikjé

text.en: And all the three worlds, you cause them to quake. (17)
text.en-trans: jikten sum nam yowa nyi ma

text.en: Homage to the one, who holds in her hand
text.en-trans: chaktsal lha yi tso yi nampé

text.en: A deer-marked moon7like a divine lake.
text.en-trans: ridak takchen chak na nam ma

text.en: Withtāratwice and then withphaṭ,
text.en-trans: tara nyi jö pé kyi yigé

text.en: You totally cleanse all of the poisons. (18)
text.en-trans: duk nam malüpar ni selma

text.en: Homage to the one, who is honored by kings
text.en-trans: chaktsal lha yi tsok nam gyalpo

text.en: Of hosts divine, gods and kiṃnaras;8
text.en-trans: lha dang mi'amchi yi ten ma

text.en: Clad in your armour of joy and splendour,
text.en-trans: künné gocha gawa ji kyi

text.en: You clear away nightmares, soothe away strife. (19)
text.en-trans: tsö dang milam ngenpa selma

text.en: Homage to the one whose eyes shine with lustre,
text.en-trans: chaktsal nyima dawa gyepé

text.en: Bright with the fullness of the sun and moon;
text.en-trans: chen nyipo la ö rabsal ma

text.en: With twice-utteredharaand then withtuttāre
text.en-trans: hara nyi jö tuttara yi

text.en: You pacify even the cruelest of diseases. (20)
text.en-trans: shintu drakpö rimné selma

text.en: Homage to the one with the power to free,
text.en-trans: chaktsal denyi sum nam köpé

text.en: Who puts forth the realities as a set of three.
text.en-trans: zhiwé tu dang yangdak den ma

text.en: Supreme Ture, you completely destroy
text.en-trans: dön dang rolang nöjin tsok nam

text.en: The hordes of grahas,9vetālas,10and yakṣas.11(21)
text.en-trans: jompa turé rab chok nyi ma

text.en: This Praise with the twenty-one verses of homage
text.en-trans: tsawé ngak kyi töpa di dang

text.en: Is itself the root mantra.
text.en-trans: chaktsalwa ni nyishu tsa chik

text.en: The wise who recite these words in earnest,
text.en-trans: lhamo la gü yangdak denpé

text.en: Filled with genuine devotion for this goddess, (22)
text.en-trans: loden gang gi rab dang jö dé

text.en: At dusk, and also having risen at dawn,
text.en-trans: sö dang torang langpar jé né

text.en: With recollection, will be granted fearlessness;
text.en-trans: drenpé mi jik tamché rab ter

text.en: They will utterly eliminate all misdeeds,
text.en-trans: dikpa tamché rabtu zhijé

text.en: And surmount all evil destinies. (23)
text.en-trans: ngendro tamché jompa nyi do

text.en: Seventy million victorious buddhas
text.en-trans: gyalwa jewa trak dün nam kyi

text.en: Will swiftly confer empowerment upon them,
text.en-trans: nyurdu wang ni kurwar gyur la

text.en: And they will attain greatness in this world,
text.en-trans: di lé chewa nyi ni tob ching

text.en: And reach the ultimate state of buddhahood. (24)
text.en-trans: sangye gopang tartuk der dro

text.en: Even the most powerful and toxic poisons,
text.en-trans: dé yi duk ni drakpo chenpo

text.en: Which derive from plants or living beings,
text.en-trans: ten nepa am zhenyang drowa

text.en: Whether eaten or taken as a draught,
text.en-trans: zöpa dang ni tungpa nyi kyang

text.en: Will be purged entirely by recalling this praise. (25)
text.en-trans: drenpé rabtu selwa nyi tob

text.en: Reciting this two or three or seven times12
text.en-trans: dön dang rim dang duk gi zirwé

text.en: Will eliminate multitudes of suffering
text.en-trans: dukngal tsok ni nampar pang té

text.en: Brought about by spirits, pestilence, and poison—
text.en-trans: semchen zhenpa nam la yang ngo

text.en: And this applies even to other beings as well. (26)
text.en-trans: nyi sum dün du ngönpar jö na

text.en: Those who wish for progeny will have them;
text.en-trans: bu döpé ni bu tob gyur zhing

text.en: Those who wish for riches will acquire them;
text.en-trans: nor döpé ni nor nam nyi tob

text.en: Each and every wish will hereby be fulfilled,
text.en-trans: döpa tamché tobpar gyur la

text.en: And obstacles, entirely vanquished, will be no more. (27)
text.en-trans: gek nam mé ching sosor jom gyur
